attributes.action: enable us to use this site to suggest and agree a real problem and its root cause(s) before petitioning for solutions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This site tempts us to rush into suggesting solutions without defining real problems and their root causes.  Our petitions will be much more helpful if they advocate improvements that address the root causes of significant problems.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
